An items will be ship by ***ePacket*** service The estimated delivery date should be approximately 9-14 business days without any unavoidable and unforeseen circumstances, in our experience.

The ePacket service is basically an agreement between the U.S. and Thailand postal services to boost trade between nations. It allows you to send something between the United States and its Asian counterparts fairly quickly.  ePacket delivery gives customers end-to-end tracking at no additional cost, Easily to monitor and locate your package on official websites such as EMS and USPS.  - first-class service from the USPS  - Door-to-door tracking  -a package can take 6-14 days to arrive from the date of shipment.
